ObjectDetection module

class ObjectDetection.ObjectDetection(UPLOAD_FOLDER, CALCULATED_FOLDER)

Bases: object

This class contains methods to generate a new picture containing the probabilities,and to calculate how many euros are in the picture.

calculate(start_date, alphanumeric_filename)

The calculate method is the main method of this class, it allows to make calculations on the image received by the server with the neural network YOLO

Parameters

  • start_date – datetime – Variable to start the execution of the program, from the reception of the request

  • alphanumeric_filename – str – Name of the file received by the server in alphanumeric format

generate_image_with_probabilities(boxes, indexes, class_ids, confidences, img)

This method generates the new image from the one received by the server, with the coins surrounded, as well as the probability of each

price_counter(boxes, indexes, class_ids)

This method allows to count the total in euro of the coins present on the photo received by the server
